Client¶

class client.Game(socket)¶

MOOD client cmd line

do_addmon(args)¶

Adds a monster to the field with the specified name, greeting, hitpoints, and coordinates.

Parameters:

  • monster_name – (str) The name of the monster. Must be one of the allowed monsters in the list ‘allow_monsters’.

  • hello – (str) The greeting string that the monster outputs.

  • hp – (int) The hitpoints of the monster.

  • coords – (tuple) The coordinates of the monster on the field in the format (x, y).

Returns:

None

do_attack(args)¶

Attacks the specified monster with the standard attack, which inflicts 10 points of damage.

Parameters:

  • name – (str) The name of the monster. Must be one of the allowed monsters in the list ‘allow_monsters’.

  • weapon – (str) The weapon to use for the attack.

Returns:

None

do_down(args)¶

Moves the player down 1 cell.

Returns:

None

do_exit(args)¶

Stop cmd line.

Returns:

None

do_left(args)¶

Moves the player left 1 cell.

Returns:

None

do_quit(args)¶

Quit from MOOD.

return:

None

do_right(args)¶

Moves the player right 1 cell.

Returns:

None

do_sayall(args)¶

Sends a message to all players.

Parameters:

message – (str) The text of the message to send.

Returns:

None

do_up(args)¶

Moves the player up 1 cell.

Returns:

None
